Accessibility

Digital Accessibility

Joes Burger Shop efforts to improve digital usability and accessibility are guided by the recommendations set forth by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), which includes the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG), among other recommendations, references, and resources.

If you are a user with a disability or an individual assisting a user with a disability, and have difficulty accessing or navigating our digital channels, please contact us at accessibility@jbs.com. In your message, please provide the following:

  • • your contact information
  • • the website address or other location where you experienced difficulty
  • • a brief description of the problem you encountered, including the type of assistive technology you were using when you experienced difficulty.

Important note: The accessibility email address should only be used for digital accessibility-related issues facing users with disabilities or those who assist them. This email address is monitored by Joe's Burger Shop Digital Accessibility team who are not equipped to review or respond to inquiries unrelated to digital accessibility.

For all other feedback and inquiries, please visit Joe's Burger Shop Customer Service page. This ensures that our Customer Service Team will review and respond to your comments.
